attributes.action: Remove the Knighthood from Irvine Patnick
attributes.additional_details:
In light of evidence uncovered by the Hillsborough Independent Panel and the subsequent apology by Prime Minister David Cameron, this petition hereby calls for 'Sir' Irvine Patnick to be stripped of his Knighthood.

'Sir' Irvine has been proved to have lied in order to cover up the loss of 96 innocent lives, the injury of hundreds more, and the long term suffering of untold amounts.
